name: Alure

skills.name: Psychic Whip
skills.description: Attacks 3 times at random. Decreases the target’s Turn Meter by 25% on each critical hit.

skills.name: Temptation
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing 30% Decrease DEF for 1 turn. Places Sleep for 1 turn on targets under Decrease DEF.
skills.books_required: A2 recommended for higher debuff chance and cooldown

skills.name: Hellish Blaze
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Extra 30% crit chance. Ignores 50% of target’s DEF.

aura: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 50.
stat_priorities: 100% Crit Rate (for A1 TM control), 210–250+ Speed, 300–350+ Accuracy (for DT Hard), HP/DEF for survivability
recommended_gear: Perception, Speed, Crit Rate, Accuracy, Relentless (for more TM control), Affinitybreaker (for Scarab King), Lifesteal (for sustain)
masteries: Offense (Giant Slayer for multi-hit A1), Support (Evil Eye, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Sniper)
notes: Does not require books for core TM control role. Build for 100% crit rate and high speed/accuracy. S-tier for Fire Knight and Dark Fae. Can be used in duplicate for Scarab King auto teams.
